resources.string: Select your occupation. You can filter the list by selecting an occupation group or pressing the Search button.
Tap on a state marker to select a state and see its mean annual salary
Tap on the state balloon to see the mean annual salaries for state cities
Select your preferred industry. You can filter the list by typing into the Search bar.
Press the Back button to return to the list of occupations
Tap on a state marker to select a state
Tap on the \"View ... top occupations\" button at the top of the screen to select the state or city or tap on the state balloon to see the cities available within the state
Enter a yearly salary in the field at the top of the screen to see how your salary compares
Tap on a state marker to select a state
Tap on the \"Select ... \" button at the top of the screen to select the state
Tap on the state balloon to see the cities available within the state
Tap on the \"Select ... \" button at the top of the screen to select the city
